lines: THERE IS A PLACE OF QUIET REST
1. Ku cifulo catalala, Mupepi na Lesa,
O Yesu Mupusushi, Atumwa na Lesa;
Twikate fwe balinda, Mupepi na Lesa.
2. Ku cifulo icansansa, Mupepi na Lesa,
Eko tukumanye Mfumu, Mupepi na Lesa.
3. Ku cifulo ca kutusha, Mupepi na Lesa,
Kwabe nsansa no mutende, Mupepi na Lesa.
